verses.text: \w Give|strong="H3205"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w barren|strong="H6135"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* bearest \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H8074"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w joyful|strong="H7440"\w* noise, thou \w that|strong="H3588"\w* didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* travail \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w husband|strong="H1166"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* thy \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* skins \w of|strong="H0168"\w* thy tabernacles, \w spare|strong="H2820"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w lengthen|strong="H0748"\w* thy \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* thy \w stakes|strong="H3489"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt pass \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w to|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*: \w and|strong="H1471"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w blush|strong="H3637"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w put|strong="H0954"\w* \w to|strong="H0954"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w* \w of|strong="H2781"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5934"\w*, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w of|strong="H2781"\w* thy \w widowhood|strong="H0491"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rule \w over|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* forsaken \w and|strong="H3068"\w* mourning \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* cast off \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For \w a|strong="H1419"\w*, \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w* \w have|strong="H5800"\w* \w I|strong="H7281"\w* forsaken thee, \w but|strong="H5800"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* \w will|strong="H1419"\w* \w I|strong="H7281"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* thee.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* indignation \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* little \w while|strong="H7281"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee, \w but|strong="H0559"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w thing|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* days \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Noe, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* no \w more|strong="H5750"\w* bring \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Noe \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* tremble; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*: \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* thee.

O \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* little \w one|strong="H3808"\w*, tossed \w with|strong="H6041"\w* tempest, \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w lay|strong="H3245"\w* thy \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w in|strong="H0068"\w* order, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w lay|strong="H3245"\w* thy \w foundations|strong="H3245"\w* \w with|strong="H6041"\w* \w sapphires|strong="H5601"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0068"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H8121"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thy bulwarks \w of|strong="H1366"\w* jasper: \w and|strong="H0068"\w* thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* graven \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w desirable|strong="H2656"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w taught|strong="H3928"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6666"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H3808"\w* founded \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*: depart \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*; \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w terror|strong="H4288"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* thee.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w an|strong="H5921"\w* inhabitant \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* was \w not|strong="H0657"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* was \w a|strong="H5921"\w* stranger \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w before|strong="H5921"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* be \w joined|strong="H0854"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H0595"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w smith|strong="H2796"\w* \w that|strong="H0784"\w* bloweth \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w coals|strong="H6352"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* an instrument \w for|strong="H3627"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H0595"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* killer \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* resisteth thee \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, thou shalt \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w*. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
